dc_title_s: Housing Statistics: Relatives, Literacy, Livestock, Gender, Dominican Republic, 2010
dc_description_s: This polygon shapefile contains statistics on relatives, literacy, livestock, and gender from the 2010 Census of the Dominican Republic. The census information was collected by the Direccion General de Estadistica y Censos (Dominican Republic) in December of 2010. The questionnaire and survey report for this census are included with this download. These data are intended for researchers, students, and policy makers for reference and mapping purposes, and may be used for basic applications such as viewing, querying, and map output production. East View Cartographic, Inc. and Direccion General de Estadistica y Censos (Dominican Republic). (2018). Housing Statistics: Relatives, Literacy, Livestock, Gender, Dominican Republic, 2010. East View Cartographic, Inc. Available at: http://purl.stanford.edu/vs103fk1332. This layer is presented in the WGS84 coordinate system for web display purposes. Downloadable data are provided in native coordinate system or projection.
dc_creator_sm: Dominican Republic. Dirección General de Estadística y Censos
